message:
Use GAV coordinates Maven Central coordinates to make sure to pick up
the latest
Refer to master branch only and drop reference to trunk branch name

Add profile.jacoco

Update code coverage badge and link
Add missing namespace and XSD to SpotBugs filter file.
Add GitHub code of conduct page that points to the Apache page.
Update ASM version to agree with pom
No need to nest in else.

Breaking binary compatibility should break the build instead of
generating a report one might skip reading, especially for PRs.
Remove redundant modifiers like static on enums.
Use Objects.requireNonNull() instead of custom check. Minor formatting.
Fix the site's source repository link.
Fix the site's source repository link.
Use HTTPS to access Apache resources.
Use HTTPS to access Apache resources.

Javadoc: Use "file system" instead of "filesystem". Camel-case
"fileSystem".
remove Javadoc references to javax.activation.DataSource; checkstyle
Build on Java 10; modification to public API requires major version bump
set up release plugin in dist module
update ASM version in release notes
ignore shaded oac.lang3 for antlib japicmp report
Workaround for japicmp report generation. Can be removed when parent moves to 48+.
code simplifications made possible with Java 8; additional null-safe method override
code simplifications made possible with Java 8
updates in preparation of a 1.4 release
WEAVER-17 make help mojo work by upgrading maven-plugin version to 3.5.2
WEAVER-16 handle classes with no package
move japicmp exclusions to pluginManagement (apply same config to mojo, report); alignment
roll back japicmp version due to #210
remove shading instructions for commons-io, which is no longer a dependency
omit shaded classes from API compatibility reporting
blueprint method references; reject blueprint methods that access inaccessible classes/methods/ctors (other than other methods also being imported
